title: Holiday Tipping Guide 2021: How Much to Give and When to Break From Tradition
sub_head: Rising inflation and a progressing pandemic have put financial strain on many service workers. Etiquette professionals advise giving as much as you can, if you can.
body:
Figuring out whom to tip—and how much—during the holidays can be tricky. Doing so during a progressing pandemic and period of rising inflation is even harder.
Many people are feeling inflationary and pandemic-related budget constraints. There is rapidly increasing rent, some home-heating bills are rising, and home-insurance premiums in certain parts of the country have grown, among other pressures.
